pages.text: A mystical tool for Blood Magic altars and rituals. The Sanguine Diviner helps you build Blood Magic altars and manage rituals by showing information and assisting with structure management.

pages.title: Altar Usage
pages.text: $(bold)Divine Structure:$()$(br)Right-click a Blood Altar to scan its structure and identify missing or obstructed components.$(br2)$(bold)Place Phantom Blocks:$()$(br)Sneak + right-click to place phantom blocks showing where components should go.$(br2)$(bold)Quick Build:$()$(br)Right-click with required components in your inventory to automatically place them in the correct positions.

pages.title: Ritual Management
pages.text: $(bold)View Ritual Info:$()$(br)Right-click a Master Ritual Stone to display:$(li)Ritual name$(li)Active/Inactive status$(li)Ritual owner$(br2)$(bold)Dismantle Ritual:$()$(br)Shift + right-click a Master Ritual Stone to safely dismantle the ritual without destroying the structure.$(br2)$(italic)A quick way to reset rituals!$()

pages.title: Features
pages.text: The Altar Diviner will:$(li)Show missing altar components$(li)Highlight obstructed positions$(li)Create visual guides$(li)Assist with tier upgrades$(li)Display ritual information$(li)Safely dismantle rituals$(br2)Essential for managing Blood Magic structures!$(br2)$(italic)Divine the perfect structure.$()
